name: Mission Runway
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

You’ve made it into the finals! Do you have what it takes to be a top model?



You’ve made it into the finals! One girl must leave the loft every week until there is only one contestant left. Compete in make-up application, test your fashion sense, show them what you have got on the catwalk and in photo shoots. You are there to win and practice makes perfect! Do you have what it takes to be a top model?
developedBy: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG

releases.developer: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG
